apple.description:
Moses was on a business trip in New York for most of the week, eating at five star restaurants while Lucie was juggling two kids and microwaving weenies.
This was his view from his office.
apple.title: Apple

birthday01.description: The Burns Sisters had their birthday party! Kora turned 6, and Torin turned 4. Torin hasn't lost her youthful exhuberance.
birthday01.title: Birthday 1

birthday03.description:
Hannah, trying to make a balloon pop.

Hannah's father, Eli, used to be Lucie's boss at Bigstep, back in 2001. Small world! Hannah, who is 2 years older than Felix, goes to the New School for after-school, where she made friend with Kora.
birthday03.title: Birthday 3

birthday04.description: Stephanie, tickling daughter Georgianna and Felix.
birthday04.title: Birthday 4

birthday05.description: The tickled fight back! Torin, Felix and Hannah pinned Stephanie to the floor.
birthday05.title: Birthday 5

birthday06.description: Meanwhile, at the craft table, Lula and mom Vikki enjoy quieter entertainment.
birthday06.title: Birthday 6

birthday07.description:
Andy, skillfully calming down the troops.

left to right: Phoebe on Laura's lap, Nate and twin sister Abby on her father's lap, Hannah on top of Andy's head, cute unidentified guest, Felix.
birthday07.title: Birthday 7

birthday08.description: The cup cakes make their grand entrance.
birthday08.title: Birthday 8

birthday10.description: Who knew that opening presents was a spectator sport?
birthday10.title: Birthday 10

birthday11.description: Milo likes baby dolls a lot.
birthday11.title: Birthday 11

birthday12.description: Sarah, errupting from between Chris's legs.
birthday12.title: Birthday 12

birthday13.description: Milo and Sarah get along very well. They played peekaboo in this closet for a long time.
birthday13.title: Birthday 13

owen0.description: We're a little behind in our mowing, so we sent Felix out to cull the herd.
owen0.title: Owen

paloalto1.description: The Palo Alto Junior Museum has a cute little zoo with peacocks, rabbits, geese, snakes, fish, owls and turtles.
paloalto1.title: Paloalto 1

paloalto2.description: Felix and Milo contend for Papa real estate.  Both are on a bit of a Dean binge because he was in New York most of the week.
paloalto2.title: Paloalto 2

paloalto3.description: Thankfully, Dean is papa enough to handle the both of them.
paloalto3.title: Paloalto 3

wrestling1.description: After crib-jumping, it's nice to follow up with a little wrestling on the big bed.
wrestling1.title: Wrestling 1

wrestling2.description: Felix and Milo have a funny relationship. They spend a lot of time bickering and competing for attention. Yet, at other times, unsolicited, Milo will give Felix big kisses, or Felix will say something like "Milo is the best baby in the world".
wrestling2.title: Wrestling 2

wrestling3.description: After a bath, Felix and Milo enjoy a good jumping session in Milo's crib.
wrestling3.title: Wrestling 3

wrestling4.description: Oops, sorry Milo, did I bonk your head?
wrestling4.title: Wrestling 4

description:
Milo's breaking out into sentences! His first sentence: He pointed to a box of cereal and said "eat that". Soon after, he walked into a wall and Lucie asked him if it hurt. He gave the baby signs for hurt and all gone. Guess his head's stronger than the wall.

Felix went to the dentist this week for his bi-yearly check-up. X-rays revealed that he has 6 cavities. Yikes! There are all between his molars. We are going back next week to take care of them. According to the dentist, his problem is that his baby teeth are bigger than average, and they are really jammed together. So now, we floss Felix's teeth.

Owen came over for a few hours on Sunday. We didn't take a picture, but Owen and Felix made the biggest mess ever in Felix's room. It was rock-star-in-a-hotel-room. They emptied every single toy box and drawer. They even took the mattress off the bed and piled it on top. Cleanup has yet to be fully completed.
title: March 12
